file_content.text: Softly you come, yes? As agreed.
You bring a Sith Lord. Expected, no concerns, no worries.
I've got your credits. You said you had more information about Tivva?
Yes. But credits first. In public. In case you do not like what you hear.
This doesn't need to be a big deal. Give us our information and we'll be on our way.
To some the deal is big, to some not so. Either way, credits first.
You did find her sister, yes?
I did, quite so. But credits first.
Freaks and nutjobs, every alien species.
Here are your credits. Now will you please tell me where my sister is?
Tivva was sold to Toobu the Hutt. Powerful. Large. He has her work.
A woman holds your sister's leash. Crystal is her name. These are the coordinates.
Fantastic. Thanks! Let's go find this Crystal woman.
You are happy. I am happy.
Bad place to be, I think.
